title: "Machine learning links material composition and performance in catalysts"
excerpt: "In a finding that could help pave the way toward cleaner fuels and a more sustainable chemical industry, researchers have used machine learning to predict how the compositions of metal alloys and metal oxides affect their electronic structures."
